Goal Representation:
['1. Gather necessary cleaning supplies for removing stains from the bathtub.', '2. Identify and ass
ess the stubborn stains in the bathtub.', '3. Use the appropriate cleaning supplies and techniques t
o remove the stains.']

behavior gather_supplies_for_stain_removal(supply:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(supply)
        observe(supply, "Check if it is needed for removing stains from the bathtub")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        foreach supply: item:
            if grabbable(supply) and not visited(supply):
                achieve_once inhand(supply)
                gather_supplies_for_stain_removal(supply)

['1. Gather cleaning supplies for the bathtub.', '2. Identify the stubborn stains in the bathtub.', 
'3. Apply appropriate cleaning agents to the stains and scrub.', '4. Rinse and check the bathtub to 
ensure stains are removed.']

behavior collect_cleaning_supplies(cleaning_supply: item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(cleaning_supply)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind scrub_brush: item where:
            grabbable(scrub_brush) and is_soap(scrub_brush)
        bind cleaner: item where:
            grabbable(cleaner) and is_soap(cleaner)
        # Assume you have a scrub brush and cleaner available
        collect_cleaning_supplies(scrub_brush)
        collect_cleaning_supplies(cleaner)
